high_descs: Turn right and walk forward to the small black dresser.
Pick up the pencil from the dresser.
Turn around and walk in front of the lamp on the desk by the wall on the right.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn right then turn left to face the desk.
Grab the blue pencil off of the desk.
Turn left a ways, then left again and turn right to face the desk.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while holding the pencil.

high_descs: Turn right, move to mirror, face the mirror on the left.
Pick up the pencil on the table.
Turn around, bring the pencil to the the far desk with the lamp on it.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light on the desk.
